name: Asteroid Crash (Innocent Traitor)
description:
Created using the GameMaker Studio 2 initial tutorial. Added a better score system, alongside a live system (+1 life every 1000 points), and a powerup.
I plan on adding in Gamepad support when I want to learn that implantation, and a saving system when I decide to learn that as well.

Controls:
Arrow Keys - Movement
Space Bar - Shoot

Github Repo - https://github.com/Innocent-Traitor/Asteroids-Crash
